Dio mio, my stomach rumbles louder than the market crowds – ten days without a proper meal is taking its toll, and with only 555 ducats to my name, finding sustenance is paramount. My recent elevation to Popolani status and this unexpected, immense responsibility of managing so many public docks for the ConsiglioDeiDieci are both blessings and heavy burdens. While I now own a Fisherman's Cottage – a roof over my head at last, even if it's on Messer BasstheWhale's land like my new market stall – my personal daily income remains stubbornly at zero. This must change. The wage cut at Messer GamingPatrizio's bakery stings, and I wonder if my time is better spent ensuring these docks under my purview flourish, hopefully leading to a substantial reward from the Consiglio. I must secure my own finances, perhaps by ensuring my market stall thrives, and cultivate strong ties with BasstheWhale and, most critically, the ConsiglioDeiDieci, as their patronage is key to my future prosperity in this great city.

My long-term vision must be to transform these opportunities into a stable flow of ducats, perhaps even acquiring my own land one day, and truly establish the Malipiero name.
